sections.full_text:
This is a correction to: James F Fleming, Davide Pisani, Kazuharu Arakawa, The Evolution of Temperature and Desiccation-Related Protein Families in Tardigrada Reveals a Complex Acquisition of Extremotolerance, 
Genome Biology and Evolution
, Volume 16, Issue 1, January 2024, 
https://doi.org/10.1093/gbe/evad217
In the originally published online version of this manuscript, details in the caption to Figure 7 were errored.
These should read: “[…]CAHS is represented in 
red
, MAHS in purple, SAHS in green, EtAHS alpha in 
yellow
, EtAHS beta in 
pink
, and MRE11 in 
blue
.[…]” instead of: “[…] CAHS is represented in 
blue
, MAHS in purple, SAHS in green, EtAHS alpha in 
red
, EtAHS beta in 
orange
, and MRE11 in 
black
.[…]”.
These errors are outlined only in this correction notice to preserve the version of record.
